attributes.action: Install legislation to make it illegal to use taxpayer pounds to fund ANY political party in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Recent announcements are part of the manipulation of the people towards funding corrupt politicians in the support of their party politicking.  Party politics is destroying this country and taxpayer pounds MUST NEVER be allowed to be used to keep political parties in existence.  Allowing their demise would be confirmation that the people don't want them around - ample justification for not using our money to keep them alive.
